 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָצַף‎</span>] **verb** ==fit together, fit out==, si vera lectio ([[Eccl.43.8|Eccl 43:8]]d id. Pi\`el ***pave*** (figurative; si vera lectio); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***raƒâpu***</u></abbr>, ***join together, build***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***join together***, compare [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>VOJ i. 30</sup>, Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רצף‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רצפם‎</span> Id<sup>ib.</sup> [[BDB#Hal|Hal]]<sup>JAS, 1872, Juin, 534</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְצַף‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***arrange in a line***; compare Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רִצְפְּתָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְצְפָה‎</span>, all = ***pavement***); — 

**Qal** ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺכוֺ רָצוּף אַהֲבָה‎</span> [[Song.3.10|Song 3:10]] ***its interior fitted out*** (?) ***with love*** ([[BDB#Gr|Gr]] and others <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָבְנִי‎</span> ***ebony***).
